column4: is there any way to make xubuntu autorecognise hardware like during install?
maybe a simple modprove is what you want?
what does dmesg say to that?
now check lsmod and grep for snd
does lsmod have anything starting with snd?
paste output of uname -a here please
paste output of uname -a here please
yeah looks like your kernel version is not the same
you should change the kernel to something more closely resembling your hardware
then reboot and check grub/lilo bootscreen, maybe you boot in the old kernel
